siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.html:
These chips show all variables configured for each data source. You can see the name of it and the range the current value is.

  1. normal range
  2. warning range
  3. error range

Hover on any to see the current value

frontmatter.title: What are chips in the data source list?
